name: The Best Resume Ever
description:
Hi everyone! My name is Xenia and I make this "resume-videogame". 

In this game you  will have to go looking for the different pieces wich make up the resume for a room and finish the resume for an interview to wich you have been called.

The controls are to simple: 

· The mouse. It's point and click game,  it's easy. 

The game is difficult?

This game is designed to play from 5 to 10 minutes. In any case if the only thing you want to see is my resume you can see inside the game, if you don't want to play. 

And what is your propose?

My propose in this project is make a diferent resume to present to companies.

Feedback

But if you just want to try,  feel free to leave your feedback down in the comments. 

Who I Am?

I'm Xenia and It's my first time to created a Videogame/Resume, I'm not a professional and I created this project alone, the sounds and the BSO it's not mine (if you want to see who i owns this BSO it's in the credits).  I'm artist both  2D and 3D (assets, environments, etc.). I love to make a videogames and I hope you like it. 

Credits and My Web Site

The B.S.O - Patrick De Arteaga. Link: https://patrickdearteaga.com

Make with Unity and the 2D make with Procreate and Photoshop.

Web Site - https://xedurami.wixsite.com/misitio

THANKS FOR ALL!
